metadata.title: CVE-2021-47025 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/mediatek: Always enable the clk on resume In mtk_iommu_runtime_resumealways enable the clk, even if m4u_dom is null. Otherwise the 'suspend' cbmight disable the clk which is already disabled causing the warning: [1.586104] infra_m4u already disabled [ 1.586133] WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 121at drivers/clk/clk.c:952
